p: Kurt et al. [ 51] synthesized a series of thymol derivatives with the carbamate moiety and tested their inhibitory effects on acetylcholinesterase (AChE) and butyrylcholinesterase (BuChE). Among the thymol derivatives, 2-isopropyl-5-methylphenyl (4-nitrophenyl)carbamate 64 ( Figure 14) shows the strongest inhibition against AChE with an IC 50 value of 2.50 μM. Moreover, insignificant cell death and nontoxicity at 0.07–10 μM in H4IIE hepatoma cell toxicity assay was found.
